142.content:
A dark clear night in the city.
Ariya sat leaning against the alley wall. The poor starving hyena hadn't had a decent meal in...she can't remember how long. Her stomach stung with gnawing hunger as it roared up at her. She could only rub it in a futile attempt to calm it.
She was so hungry she had become a little dazed and lost her way. Too weak to think about anything other than where to find food that didn't have insects or rot crawling all over it.
As she curled up and lay on her side in the pitch black alley, she attempted to try and get some sleep, to ignore the pangs of starvation.
That is, until, she heard a noise. Her ear flicked and she looked up as she saw a door swing open nearby. A large human, male she assumed, walked out with a large black bag and dumped it against the alley wall. Ariya was thankful for the darkness, the man couldn't see her so he couldn't shoo her off.
As the human walked back inside, Ariya's mind was finally taken off her hunger and instead burned with a question.
What was in the bag?
Staying quiet as a mouse, she slunk on all fours to the bag, pawing and sniffing at it.
Her claws had managed to create a small tear in the bag and instinctively pointed her nose into it, snuffling.
She gasped. Eyes widened. Stomach roaring. Her first smile in ages.
FOOD!!
She took both sides of the rip and tore the bag open, watching as the enormous bounty of delectables poured out like a wave in front of her. She didn't know what any of it was but it smelt amazing!
Humans are such idiots, she thought. Why would they waste such good food?!
And with that, the starving hyena dug into her feast.

Her decision was the right one, as the same man threw out more perfectly good food in black trash bags the next night....and the next night....and the next night....and so on. And each night, Ariya would open the trash bags and gorge herself on the food contained with in until it was all within her belly, before making her way into the alleyway she had made into her current residence to sleep on a overfull stomach, letting it digest. While Ariya had lost track of time a while back, it had been two weeks since she had first decided to camp the alleyway for a consistent meal. Her constant gorging had internal effects as well as the obvious external ones: her stomach got used to being crammed full of food, so it stretched out and hurt less every time she ate her ‘dinner’. Her hunger pains also slowly faded away from her having a constant source of food.

Her body was showing the signs of her gorging even more then a normal person’s would, due to her having gone without proper food for a long while, and her body desperately trying to build the fat back up she had lost. Her body thickened quite quickly, her thighs going from bony to thick to always touching, and her butt becoming much larger and far less firm. Her waist filled out, her ribs now buried in a layer of fat and a nice set of love handles framed her larger, round gut, which was as big as it had been after her first gorge. Her breasts were bigger then before, but still rather small. Her arms had gotten chunky, and her paws had swelled slightly. Her face had filled out a bit, and the beginnings of a second chin was visible. Ariya was grateful for this, as not only was it a layer of warmth the ratty clothes she currently wore sorely lacked, it was also a layer of protection she had for whenever she had to move on...if she could move on.

While every concurrent day risked either the man not throwing food out the next day or her increasingly fat ass getting caught, Ariya found she couldn’t move on from the location she was currently in. The constant stream of food she was getting was a luxury she couldn’t afford to lose, and she couldn’t guarantee that wherever she ended up next would have the same opportunity.
So, she decided to stay put, as her other options were no good.

"Oh, where is it? I know it's here somewhere." A young woman voice calls out through an apartment, boxes stacked around the rooms, evidence of a recent move. "I know I packed it, but where....no, no, no!" A thump and clatter comes from the bedroom, where the voice was coming from. "That wasn't supposed to fall like that."

With a sigh, Sarah puts the fallen box back onto the stack and starts sorting through the items that spilled out of it. "No, no, that's not it, I didn't even know I still had this but still no... I know I packed my old jewelry box here somewhere, just where did it end up though?" She says to herself as she looks around at some of the other boxes she had checked through. With a shake of her head, she flops down on her bed. She is a bit surprised by the fact that her body keeps moving for a second or two after she has stopped.

Looking down her body, she is somewhat surprised by what she sees. Her generous bust is pushing against her formerly loose shirt, a bit of cleavage visible through the neck hole. Below that is her stomach, a plush furred dome pulling the hem of her shirt up. Her hips are stretching her pants out a good amount, tightening them across her rump. Her whole body is plumped up a bit from when she was still living at home, and that wasn't all that long ago.

She knew that that she had put on some weight, but this was the first time that she actually noticed all of it on her body. Not having time to hit the gym and mostly only eating fast food and vending machine snacks were likely culprits. She just didn't have the time to cook for herself usually, and didn't have the time or energy to hit the gym or do any beneficial amount of exercise between her work at a local office building (mostly running mail around, or taking care of some of the errands throughout the building), and taking some college classes in the hours where she wasn't working. This was actually one of the first times that she had any real amount of free time in a while.

The more she thought about it through, she started to think that perhaps Shiara was also at least partially to blame for her increasing weight. Shiara was a secretary for one of the big wigs at their work. After their first meeting, over a handful of mail, Shiara had taken a liking to Sarah and kind of taken the young vixen under her wing. Shiara had started showing Sarah around the city, and was helping her to form connections within the business. More often than not, their meetings would also involve large meals from some of the various more upscale restaurants that Shiara seemed to frequent. She always seemed to be lightly pushing Sarah to try this, or take a taste of that, and so on. Sarah was glad to have made a new friend who was helping her out like this, but was kind of surprised by how much food showed up when Shiara was involved.

A knock at the door stirs Sarah out of her thoughts. She also realized that she had one hand under her shirt, kneading her soft stomach without her knowing she was doing it. With a huff, she pulls her hand out, stands up, and makes her way to the door. Checking through the peephole, she sees...

Looking through the peephole, Sarah can only two large round blue mountains with a long valley between them. Shaking her head a bit, Sarah opens the door, knowing that only Shiara would likely be knocking on her door with only those mounds visible. She was proven correct when she saw Shiara standing there with a smile on her face.

"Hey Sarah, I was just in the neighborhood and decided I should check up on you, see if you've gotten anything more unpacked..." Looking through the door, she can easily see the boxes still in stacks behind Sarah. "And I guess that would be a no. Do you mind if I come in, I might be able to help you out."

"Yeah, yeah, come on in. I've been trying to get some stuff unpacked, but mostly I've been looking for my old jewelry box, I know I packed it somewhere, but it's just a matter of where."

Sarah looks back over her shoulder as Shiara came in and shut the door. Shiara was a large specimen of a dragoness, standing at about seven feet tall, and covered in deep blue scales. One of the first things that most people seemed to notice was Shiara's immense bust, large fleshy breasts, slightly lengthened under their own weight, Shiara tended to wear low cut tops to better show her cleavage. Had that been her only defining trait, Sarah would have likely thought of Shiara had just had an overdone breast enlargement. The rest of her body showed just how her bust had gotten like that though. Her breasts rested atop the bloated sphere of her stomach, large and fleshy drooping down onto her hips. The weight of her stomach and the fat on her sides combined to form large rolls that went across her sides and her back. Her hips always seemed to be straining whatever bottom she seemed to squeeze herself into, each of them easily wider than most other people's shoulders. Her arms and lower legs seemed to nearly constantly ripple with the fat encasing them. Her face had rounded cheeks with a fleshy chin under her muzzle. Despite her size, or perhaps even because of it, Shiara took good care with herself. She never seemed to have problems getting around even with all of her weight, proving the muscle buried under the fat. She always took the best care of her long black hair, and her body, keeping all clean and shiny. All in all, Sarah only wished that she could show as much confidence in her body as Shiara does in hers.

"Well, I'm sure that you'll find it. Though it might help if you start unpacking everything first." Shiara suggested, smiling as she saw Sarah looking over her body. Shiara certainly enjoyed positive attention about her body.

"I've been trying to, but everything else has been keeping me busy, what with work and schooling and everything." Sarah responded, as she led Shiara to her living room and removed a couple of boxes from the couch. She then took a seat in a nearby chair, leaving Shiara to sit down on the couch herself, her body settling and taking up much of the room on her own.

"What do you say I help you out a bit, then perhaps I could interest you in joining me for a meal. I know of a great place nearby, and I think you'll like it." Shiara said with a grin.

Sarah gave an amused sign, she had been expecting Shiara to offer food to her again. She was starting to wonder if perhaps she shouldn't be eating with Shiara so much though.

155331111.content:
With a sigh, Sarah agreed "Yeah, we can go out to get something to eat, but only after we get some done here."

"No problem, I wasn't planning on having us run off yet anyways," Shiara responded. "Now, shall we get to work?" She said as she heaved her body off of the couch, which seemed to groan with relief after the dragoness had lifted her weight off.

Together, they started working on the boxes. Surprisingly, Shiara seemed to move with a bit more grace than Sarah would have thought possible, mostly avoiding the boxes as they worked, not counting a few accidents. Things were quickly put away as the two of them worked at it, and the boxes were quickly folded down and made ready to recycle. More than a few times as Sarah had to reach up high or bend over low to put something away or pick something up, she thought she could feel Shiara was staring at her, but she couldn't catch the dragoness in the act, so she just shrugged it off.

"Ah there it is." Sarah said after nearly finishing with another box. "Why did it end up in this box though," holding up the jewelry box she had been looking for. The box it was in clearly contained some kitchen supplies her parents had given to her, not really a place for a jewelry box.

"Who knows how some things end up where they do, but I did tell you that you would find it."Shiara responded as she finished with another box herself. "Well, I do believe that we did a pretty good job so far, so what do you saw we stop here and go out for that bite to eat?"

Sarah looked at her apartment, they had done a great job already, getting more done in the last while than she had mostly since she had moved in. There were still a few boxes here and there, but all in all the place was starting to look more like a home rather than a warehouse.

"I guess we can get going thank you for all of your help so far, Shiara." Sarah said with a smile.

Shiara just beamed, "Oh, it's no trouble. I enjoy helping you out Sare."

"Just let me put this away and we can get going." Sarah said as she took the jewelry box back to her bedroom. Setting it on the dresser she was about to leave when she noticed her closet door was ajar, and inside it looked like some of her clothes had been moved around a bit. Sarah didn't remember any clothes being in any of the boxes they had done, so had Shiara been in her closet when she wasn't looking? Sarah shook her head, and got rid of that idea. She had likely just forgotten to shut the door when she got dressed this morning.

"Besides what reason would Shiara have to go through my closet?" Sarah thought to herself as she shut the closet door and left her bedroom.

Shiara was already standing there with the door open and waiting. A quick elevator trip a few floors downstairs, and they were out on the street. Sarah started to walk towards Shiara's car, specially made for someone of her dimensions, but noticed that Shiara was walking the other way.

"Aren't we taking your car, Shiara?"

"Oh, no, it's just a couple of blocks this way, dear." Shiara responded, before continuing on her way, easily clearing a path through the people on the sidewalk.

Sarah thought about it for a moment and then followed the retreating form of the dragoness, stuck behind that massive shifting butt as the people flowed around Shiara. Shiara seemed to be setting the pace much more than Sarah could, despite their weight differences.

A few blocks over, Shiara pointed to a seemingly small building front that Sarah had never paid much attention to before, and led them inside. As Sarah went inside, she saw the small sign with the name of the restaurant. It said simply "The Feeding Room".

Inside she found Shiara already talking with a hostess, a slender rabbit girl in a frilly outfit.

"Your usual room, Shiara?" The rabbit femme asked.

"Not today, Lana. I'm just bringing a first timer in here to get her something to eat." Shiara said, looking around a bit before finding Sarah standing behind her and bringing her around so that Lana could see her. "This is Sarah, and she hasn't been in town for long."

"Oh, hello, Sarah, my name is Lana, though I guess you already know that." She said with a giggle. "Any friend of Shiara's is welcome here. I'll show both of you to a table then."

Lana then walked out from behind the little stand to a door that would likely lead into the main part of the restaurant. As she stepped out though, Sarah was more than a little surprised to see that Lana's stomach was left uncovered and was easily the size of a small beach ball. Shiara seemed to not notice, or if she did, found nothing odd about it, merely motioning for Sarah to come along.

As they stepped through the door, Sarah found that she had drastically underestimated the size of the place. It was easily the size of a warehouse, and mostly opened spaced. Half of the space was taken up by multiple rows of buffet tables, while the other half was taken up by seating. There wasn't that many customers here, but that didn't stop them from taking up a lot of room. Almost all of the people were women, and more than half of those were all in the larger stages of what Sarah would call fat. Most of those were somewhere smaller than Shiara, a few were around her size, while one was truly immense, almost whale-like in her size.

As Lana led them to a table in the back, a few of the others looked up and gave a wave or otherwise acknowledged Shiara. It seemed that she was quite well known here.

Sarah took a seat on one side of the table, thinking that Shiara would sit on the other. Shiara instead motioned for Sarah to move over, before taking a second seat and sitting herself down, effectively pinning Sarah in the corner behind Shiara's body.

"I'll let you two get settled in. You know the drill, Shiara. I'll get the drinks, and then we can get started with the food." Lana said with a smile as she walked off.

Sarah looked up at Shiara, "So what's up with this place?"

"Oh, it's just a place that's more than a little appreciative of the larger female form." Shiara responded, looking out across at the other people.

"Yeah, I think I got that." Sarah said, looking out herself. There was a number of waitresses moving back and forth between the seating, the buffet tables, and a few doors that most likely led to the kitchen. She stared as four waitresses carried a huge covered platter between them, heading for a series of doors along one wall that Sarah didn't notice before.

"What's back there, behind those doors?" Sarah asked.

"The private rooms, things can get a little more..." She seemed to think about the right word for a bit. "Interesting back there, shall I say. I figured I would just get you started a bit more basic first." A grin curling her muzzle and denting her cheeks.

Sarah was about to respond but Lana came back with a couple of huge glasses filled with what seemed to be pink lemonade. Sarah was about to say that she hadn't ordered it, but was cut off by Shiara.

"Lana, we'll just take the standard, don't want to get started off too fast."

"Coming right over." Lana said before darting off again.

Sarah looked back at Shiara quizzically, who responded "It's the standard drink that comes with, it helps with the digestion. And as for the food, don't worry about it."

Sarah was again cut off as Lana led a line of waitresses to the table, each of them loaded down with platters heaped with many delicious looking food items. Fried chicken, mashed potatoes, a whole ham, a huge turkey breast, and on and on. Soon, the huge table was completely covered with food. As the rest of the waitresses filed off, Lana remained behind.

"Will there be anything else, Shiara?"

"Not right now it seems, and pass along my compliments to the chefs, it all looks great as always."

"Of course." Lana said and left with another giggle.

"Well come on, don't want the food to get cold." Shiara said, before starting to dig into one of the pieces of fried chicken.

Sarah was stunned by the amount of food in front of her, but she was feeling somewhat hungry. So she took a drink from the glass and tried some of the ham with the mashed potatoes. Then she tried some of the turkey. Shiara would stop from time to time to look at Sarah's progress, As Sarah started to slow down, Shiara tutted.

"Is that all your're going to eat, I think you can do better than that. What do you say I help you out a bit?" Shiara couldn't quite read the look that Shiara was giving her, and wasn't sure whether she should be scared or not. Did she really want to eat any more, even if Shiara was going to be "helping" her?

Something things in life are just plain hard.

Finding a half-decent, secure job in a small, remote town is hard. Being the only cat in an all-rodent community is hard. Losing weight is especially hard, at least for me.

But I’m no stranger to hard work. And after all, I have my ways of ‘coping’.

It used to be drinking, but I quit that at rehab. But just my luck, the second I dropped one habit, I picked up another. No rest for the wicked, I guess. So what do I do when I get stressed nowadays? You guessed it -- I eat. I eat a lot.

And I have quite a few things to be stressed about. For example, the crappy studio apartment I live in was designed for someone half my height, so I have to constantly duck down to avoid smashing my head against the ceiling.

Currently, I was scowling at my own naked body with disgust in the mirror (basically part of my morning routine now). “Hey, come on. You don’t look too bad. You’re just a bit… curvy,” I say to myself, but don’t believe my own words. I doubt anyone would want a girl with a belly like mine.

Things used to be different. I used to be slim and sexy, with a perfect hour glass figure. Men and women alike used to admire and/or envy my body as I passed, but now, they hardly give me the time of day.

I get dressed, stretching on a t-shirt that doesn’t even completely cover my belly anymore, and pants that struggle to contain my thick thighs. At this rate, I’ll have to buy an entirely new wardrobe. I shudder at the very thought of how much that must cost. I already blow enough money on food these days. As I put on more and more pounds, I can’t help but feel I’m digging myself into a deeper and deeper hole, physically and financially.

Immediately upon getting ready, I rush to the apartment complex’s gym before anyone else got there. I like to have the whole gym to myself, you see. Exercising in front of anyone else makes me feel self-conscious.

To my dismay, my downstairs neighbors was at the gym, but luckily, she seemed like she was wrapping up. I pretend to do warm-up while I wait for her to leave, but just as I was getting comfortable, I felt someone tugging at the base of my shirt.

I look down, to find a curious little mouse boy looking up at me. Ah! This must be my neighbor’s son. I was used to being taller than my neighbors, as mouse people were roughly around 3 feet tall on average, but this kid was around half of even that height. Thus, I was about for times as tall as the boy was, and towered over him like a mountain.

I almost found the scrawny little mouse cute, until he started laughing. “Haha! Wow, lady! You’re really fat!” he laughed, and I cringed. Was I really that overweight?

I stared at his mother, expecting her to step in, but apparently, she wasn’t paying any attention. “Gee, thanks, kid. I really needed to hear that today,” I say sarcastically with a roll of my eyes, before walking over to the other side of the gym, trying to put some distance between me and him. Unfortunately, he doesn’t seem to get the message, and follows me.

“How did you even get so big, lady?” he pestered me, following me across the gym. When I reach a dead end, I sigh, turning to face him. Normally, I would get angry at this point, but he was just a kid. He was probably just curious.

“You shouldn’t ask people about their weight, young man,” I lecture the tiny mouse in the most assertive voice I could muster. “It’s not polite.”

He stares at me for a second, before smirking. “Why should I care? You’re just a fatty,” he mocks me, with the worst smug smile on his face. Alright, now I’m mad!

“Why, you-” I start to growl angrily.

“Kyle! It’s time to go!” his mother calls from across the gym, interrupting me before I could launch into my angry tirade. He stuck his tongue out at me, before darting off, leaving before I could get out another word. I was left to silently fume with anger, but I decided to just push the whole incident out of my mind and not let it ruin my work-out.

I didn’t know much about exercising, but I figured as long as I was burning calories, I was making some progress, right? Well, I ran into a few problems. First off, the equipment at this gym was designed for mice, and was way too small for me to use effectively.

But the other problem seems to be physical. No matter what I do, I seem to be completely unable to really lose any weight. Every pound I gain seems to be here to stay. Maybe I just have a bad metabolism? Either way, after putting myself through the most strenuous routine I could manage, I still hadn’t made any progress.

I emerged from the gym about three hours later, panting from exhaustion. I use up the last of my energy to stumble back to my apartment and crash on my bed. These trips to the gym seemed to be agonizing and completely ineffective… but I had to do something. I wasn’t going down without a fight!

The worst part is, though, that all that work only made me even hungrier. I clutched my big belly as it growled loudly, whimpering at the feeling of starvation. I certainly wasn’t hungry for health food, either -- I was hungry for something sweet. I tried to resist the siren’s call of the cookies in my pantry, but my willpower, unfortunately, is extremely weak.

I relent, unable to control myself. I grab the cookies, futilely resolving to only have a few… but the second I look down upon them, and that delicious smell hits my nose, I’m gripped with a pure, uncontrollable desire. That was another one of my problems, in fact; whenever I get my hands on something tasty, I literally can’t help myself.

I start chomping down on the cookies, taking my time at first, but gradually becoming more and more eager, until I was literally swallowing them whole one-by-one. I knew I would regret this later, but… they just taste so good! I was hardly in control of my body, at this point. I was running on auto-pilot, in a moment of pure indulgence.

The next few moments are a blur. All I can recall is the sweets disappearing down my gullet in waves, and the delicious taste relaxing and making me, if only for a moment, forget all my problems. Soon, I reached to grab some more cookies, only to discover I had cleared out the entire sleeve!

Still unsatisfied, I threw the emptied packet aside, digging through my pantry for more junk food to calm my burning stomach. It seemed like, with every passing day, my gluttony was only growing stronger and more uncontrollable.

Only once I had cleared the entire pantry of snacks did my feast come to a stop. I laid on the bed again, wrapping my hands around my belly in awe, which was now filled with junk food. I should probably feel regretful right now, but honestly, I just feel content. Having a big, full stomach was incredibly relaxing to me.

I lay there for a while, enjoying the feeling of my own hands massaging my achingly full stomach. Man, what has come over me recently? I’ve just been in a nosedive lately, health-wise. I’d work with a personal trainer of something, but I’m not sure I have the money to spare. At this point, though, I’m seriously considering it.

I watched television for a while, ruminating on my situation. As I said, I was the only cat in an all-rodent town, so everyone was around half my height and at least moderately afraid of me. Thus, I didn’t really have many friends in town, which got a little lonely sometimes. Well, all the time, actually.

Just as I was about to doze off, my phone started to ring loudly. I groaned, grabbing it and seeing it’s from a friend from my old town -- a cougar named Elly.

“Hey, Elly,” I greet nervously, trying to sound natural.

“Hey, Kacey! I’ve been trying to call you for a while now,” she greets, with her typical giddy tone of voice. I envy her enthusiasm, now more than ever. “It’s been so long since I’ve heard from you. I’ve just been dying to see how your new life has been going!”

“Umm… it’s going great,” I lie.

“Really, now?” she says, a little speculatively. “I read that that store you’ve been working at went belly-up recently. So you’re probably out of a job now, right?” I sighed. Apparently news travels quickly. I used to have a pretty decent manager job downtown until the company closed the store down and threw me out on my big, round butt.

“Yeah, but I’m not going to let that slow me down,” I groan, through gritted teeth. “You know me. A real go-getter.”

“That’s my girl! Glad to hear you’re doing well,” she replies. “How’s the town, by the way? Your sis showed me some pictures of it, and it looks absolutely beautiful.”

“Oh, that’s for sure, at least,” I admit. The scenery around here, up in the mountains perched right over an exquisite blue lake, was breathtaking. “It’s been a little, uh… awkward settling in, though. You know how mice are around cats.”

“Oh, do I ever! A mighty timid lot, they are,” she laughs. “But they’ll always warm up to you if you give them the chance. You just have to get out a little more, that’s all.”

Get out more. For some reason, that line struck me. I do need to get out more. Lounging around this apartment all day every day has been driving me a little nutty. But where could I go?

155332222212.content:
Immense, that was the first word that popped into Lyra’s mind when she first saw Isabella, and that description still held true, in fact it was even more so now than when the bovine had first laid eyes on the dragon vixen—draxen. Standing just over eight feet and five inches tall, Isabella towered over most anyone, Lyra included. She was also extremely wide, fat swelling her body in all directions. Giant jiggling breasts, a massive mound of a stomach, huge hips, there wasn’t a part of Isabella that wasn’t so swollen with fat that the slightest motion would send her wobbling for minutes if not longer. Her hybrid heritage also lent her an exotic air, and her body was covered in thick black and grey fur mixed with bands and patches of onyx scales. She also possessed such incredible confidence that Lyra was even a bit jealous.

“It’s nice to be appreciated sometimes,” Isabella –Izzy for short – said with a sultry purr, exaggerating her slight Spanish accent. “But don’t you know that staring can be considered rude?”

Izzy added a sashay to her walk, sending further ripples throughout her huge body, as she stepped up in front of Lyra. Still seated on the bed, the relatively smaller bovine was nearly completely lost in the shadow of the much larger woman standing over her.

“Well, you are a very impressive woman after all, so it’s hard not to stare” Lyra said, similarly exaggerating her southern drawl.

“Hmm…don’t I know that,” Izzy said with a slight grin curling her lips, barely visible to Lyra because of the swell of the dragon vixen’s bust.

Isabella’s hands then roamed her body, or at least what they could, poking and prodding, wiggling and jiggling, and grabbing and lifting as they went. Before she was even done playing around with herself, she took another step forward, then another, and another, till Lyra was being swamped by the flesh of the massive draxen. Izzy still kept moving, and then proceeded to lean over, falling onto the bed and Lyra, though for Lyra, it was less a fall and more an onrushing avalanche of dark furred fat. The smaller woman was completely buried under Izzy, faced with a bit of a struggle to breathe, but she couldn’t stop it, nor would she if she could. With enough squirming around, Lyra managed to get her face partially into the vast canyon that was the larger woman’s cleavage, which allowed her to almost get enough air to breath. Izzy laughed a bit at feeling Lyra’s movements beneath her, though it was more something that the cow felt rather than heard because of her situation.

Then, without warning, Isabella reached under and took a hold of Lyra before slowly rolling around, so that their positions ended up reversed: Lyra atop Isabella, though it was far easier for the smaller of the two like that. As much as Lyra enjoyed the feeling of being crushed by so much woman, it did make things difficult for her. Things like the multiple rounds of lovemaking that kept the two of them awake for much of the night, the unfortunate bed creaking and groaning under the immense load and even larger forces it was subjected to. When the sun was just starting to tint the sky over the horizon, both women were completely spent, and so they finally curled up and went to sleep, Lyra bundled up against the bulk of Isabella’s body.

When Lyra finally awoke past noon, she found Isabella was…

Isabella turns the tables on Lyra and has some fun of her own.
1553322222121.content:
Lyra woke up warm, though with half of her body buried in Izzy’s fat, that wasn’t too surprising. She snuggled back down, ready to go back to sleep for a bit longer. That didn’t work out so well as a loud growl drowned out the soothing noise of Isabella breathing slow and low, and caused Lyra to pop back up. When it happened again, she realized that Isabella was hungry, and her stomach was expressing it’s unhappiness with that situation even though she was still sleeping. Regretfully, Lyra detangled from the covers as well as Izzy’s rolls of fat, feeling the cool air settle on her body, chilling her skin even through her fur. She started to walk off, but quickly turned on her heel and leaned over the hills and valleys of Izzy’s body to give her a quick peck on the cheek and brush a lock of her blue hair out of her face; even asleep the draxen responded slightly, a smile curling the edges of her lips. That little enjoyable task finished, Lyra turned around again and grabbed a robe before heading out of the room, pulling the robe on as she went. Her hands traced her curves, feeling how the heavy meal she had the night before had added just a bit to her frame: a little bit larger bust that caused the robe to hang a bit further out, same with her butt hiking the already high-cut rear a bit higher, and a little bit more weight to her stomach in the shadow of her breasts.

As Lyra walked through the spacious penthouse apartment with tall and wide windows affording a view of the city bustling far below, she reflected on how much she enjoyed the time spent with Isabella since she had asked the smaller woman to come live with her. The perk of being able to have Isabella all to herself was a nice one, almost as nice as the perk of also being involved with adding even more luscious fat onto the tremendous draxen. Lyra stopped in the living room, propping her arms on the back of one of the couches, looking out through the floor to ceiling window that dominated the far wall and provided a wonderful view of the ocean at one side and the local mountains at the other.

It still impressed Lyra about the contrast that Isabella provided; she worked in what basically amounted to a strip club, a very classy one that featured only people pushing the high end of the scale, but a strip club nonetheless. Despite that, Isabella was smart and extremely wealthy; a combination of a big inheritance and astute investing meant that Isabella never actually had to work a day in her life. She still chose to sometimes appear in that club though; she enjoyed and even craved the attention she got there, they lusty and envious gazes that she got from almost everyone who showed up at the club.

That was where the two of them met actually: Isabella was an infrequent act at the club, but still the headline act, while Lyra had only heard about the club third hand and had barely been able to work up the nerve to actually go. Even after she arrived, her confidence was about to fail her till the lights dimmed and the massive bulk of the draxen swept down the stage packed into tight fitting clothes. Something about the shifting fat, the shimmering fur, and the grace and confidence in every movement made Lyra sit back down and watch the show, watch pieces of Isabella’s outfit slowly, tantalizingly slip off of her body, revealing more and more flesh and being flung either onto the stage or even out into the audience. The bovine had been getting hot and bothered already, but when the draxen finished taking everything off, she leapt up onto the center stage pole, locked her legs up high and leaned back till she was hanging upside down, her body rapidly flowing according to gravity’s whims. That almost proved too much for Lyra, but she still surprised herself when she managed to persuade someone to let her slip backstage to meet the incredible woman that had captivated her attention.

Isabella was apparently impressed as well and really shocked Lyra by asking the smaller woman out. Their relationship blossomed from there, till eventually Izzy asked Lyra to move in with her. Lyra had been ecstatic, and still was too; being with such gourmand gave Lyra’s culinary talents such a workout, talents she had acquired from both her mother and father and that she was only too happy to put to such good use. Last night had just been a fun night out for the two of them, time for both to enjoy without needing to worry about the making or cleaning up of the meal, or in the case of Izzy meals, she packed away quite a bit.

Reminiscing wasn’t going to feed Izzy today though, so Lyra turned away from the panoramic view and made for the kitchen. Once there, she set an even more rapid pace, dashing to and fro making use of everything in the well-appointed kitchen. Her robe fluttered as she prepared platter after platter of food, veritable heaps of it, mostly to fill the ravenous maw of Izzy, with some left for herself. When she hit a bit of a lull, she leaned back on the center island, while still keeping an eye on everything. A hand strayed a bit of its own volition, coming to rest against her pudgy belly. Again, she thought about the weight she had been putting on, how it had been adding onto her already impressive hourglass figure, as well as adding a bit of extra width to the middle of that hourglass. Izzy certainly didn’t seem to mind, she actually seemed to prefer Lyra’s extra padding, as well as tempting her with a bit of extra food here and there. The southern lady also enjoyed eating and was coming around to the feeling of her belly nice and full and maybe even a bit overfull, sometimes even quite a bit overfull if Izzy had anything to do with it. The smells of everything she was cooking was already making her drool a bit, both from the implied taste as well as the thought of every morsel packed away within both of their bodies.

Lyra was just finishing up with dishing everything up when she heard the bed creaking in a very recognizable way. Immediately after, she could also hear the steady thumping of a great mass ponderously making its way through the house. Lyra quickened her pace, taking multiple trips back and forth till the table was almost groaning under the feast laid out atop it, and yet there still wasn’t enough room, some had to be left covered and waiting on the island in the kitchen. As she finished placing down the last platter of bacon – and wiped up a bit of a spill – Lyra felt and heard Izzy come up behind her; the thumping stopped and she was well aware of the wall of softness pressing against her back. Without looking back, Lyra dropped one of her hands and groped part of the lowest swell of Izzy’s stomach, feeling the fat squish between her fingers and bringing a pleased rumble to the draxen’s throat. Releasing her grasp, Lyra then motioned for Izzy to take a seat before doing so herself: Izzy in her specially reinforced chair – which still obviously strained and groaned under the woman lowering herself on the piece of furniture – while Lyra took a seat beside her. Izzy then showed some incredible restraint, holding back despite the clear hunger that was being stirred in her by the sights and smells of the food, and let Lyra get her portion first, since there wasn’t like to be much of a chance of that once Isabella got started herself. With Lyra done, Izzy dug in with wild abandon, but definitely not like a slob, as despite her speed and gusto she made sure that every morsel made its way into her mouth.

15533222221213.content:
Lyra soon finished her portion, while Isabella was still going strong. The bovine waited a while, savoring the view of the draxen stuffing herself with such enthusiasm, but eventually figured that she should bring the rest of the food out. Clearing away some of the already cleaned plates, she soon returned with the remaining platters. When she returned, Lyra saw that Izzy was just about finished with the larger first portion, but had slowed down. Lyra found this somewhat odd, and was more surprised by the predatory gleam in Izzy’s eyes. The larger woman motioned for Lyra to take her seat again, and she figured that Izzy must have wanted to be fed by her or something, which was a reasonably common occurrence, but Lyra soon found that Izzy had something else in mind.

Once Lyra was seated, Isabella shifted around – her chair groaning the whole way – so that the two of them were facing each other. Izzy’s fleshy stomach and breasts flowed over the smaller woman, pinning her in place yet again. The look on Izzy’s face and the way she kept licking her lips started to concern Lyra, making her wonder if Izzy was going to eat her like she had occasionally done to some other people, especially those that went to the club and never returned, except as further padding on her body. Lyra was somewhat relieved when Isabella picked up a serving spoon, loaded it down with a small mound of food, and held it in front of the smaller woman’s mouth.

“You’ve been doing well so far, my pet, but I think we can do better, so you’re going to eat everything I give you, right?” Izzy asked, but the tone in her voice left no doubt that it was a command, rather than a question.

Lyra saw little choice but to nod her head slightly and open her mouth wide. What followed was unlike anything the smaller woman had ever personally experienced before: Isabella used Lyra like a food balloon, stuffing her with ever last remaining bit of food. The two of them almost became a machine with Izzy scooping up the food, and Lyra dutifully opening her mouth and eating every bit. The remaining bit was more than two to three times what Lyra ate in an average day, and yet Izzy was making sure that the bovine was eating every bit in one sitting. Lyra’s eyes glazed over not even halfway through being fed everything and a portion of her mind that was still functioning kept thinking that she would explode with the next bite, but it never came.

Izzy kept praising Lyra for doing such a good job, as well as saying that they only had a bit more to go, and tenderly lightly caressed and rubbed the smaller woman. Lyra’s stomach continued to balloon further and further, and her hide creaked and groaned, the sounds mingling with her moaning as more and more food was shoved into her mouth, adding to the lump in her stomach. After giving Lyra the last spoonful, Izzy tenderly kissed the bovine on the nose, before prodding the rock hard mass of her stomach. Some part of Lyra’s mind registered that it wasn’t exactly painful, but it also wasn’t very comfortable either. Trying to say so only resulted in a massive belch that rocked her in her seat and caused her stomach to clench around the hard ball of food. She must have blacked out for a bit because the next thing Lyra knew, she was laying down in the living room on one of the sofas, with her head resting against the pillowy fat of Izzy’s stomach, and the TV droning.

Lyra’s mind felt foggy and unresponsive, almost as unresponsive as the rest of her body. She managed to look down just slightly, but it was enough to see her stomach rising over her, even higher than her breasts, quite a new development for the bovine considering the impressive size of her bust. She was distracted when a handful of chips were shoved into her mouth.

“Don’t think we’re done here, dear. I’m going to make sure to take full advantage of this,” Isabella purred as she pressed another handful of chips into Lyra’s mouth.

Izzy kept Lyra stuffed the whole day; snacks for the most part, but dinner of several different take out places packed so much food into Lyra’s stomach that by the time the two of them retired to bed, the smaller woman was completely pinned in place by the groaning mass of her stomach. It looked like she had a beach ball in her body, but the weight of it was more like a supersized medicine ball. The draxen seemed very pleased with herself, a near constant rumble in the back of her throat that tickled Lyra’s ear as they lay together on the bed. Lyra couldn’t do much of anything, barely able to gasp for breath, and unable to move because of her stomach and the shock of how much she had eaten throughout the day. Izzy didn’t seem to mind though, perfectly content to enjoy the look on Lyra’s face and the rock hard boulder of her stomach. As they drifted off to sleep together, one thought kept popping up in Lyra’s mind: was this going to be happening again?

15533222223221.content:
"I'm home!" Tiffany announced as she slithered into the house. She received no reply to her call.

"Chelsea must still be out," she thought as she hung up her coat and purse by the door. "Good."

Tiffany had a large paper bag in hand, courtesy of MacGuffin's, a local fast food chain famous for its burgers. Her stomach let out a quiet growl as she made her way to the dining room.

Tiffany and her friend Chelsea were renting this house from her uncle Chuck. It wasn't a very big place, but more then enough for the two young women. There were three bedrooms upstairs, and Chuck had given them the option to sub-rent the third room if they so desired. On the main floor, the front door opened into the small living room. From there, you could go into the kitchen, which in turn branched into the dining room and a pretty impressive bathroom for such a small place. The utility room was also directly off the kitchen, and through the dining room was access to the mud room, which contained a stackable washer/dryer, a deep freeze, and a freestanding pantry.

The driveway out front was only large enough for a single car. Chelsea used that, while Tiff parked her vehicle in the garage out back. Granted, the only road access to the building was a dirt backlane, but she seldom drove, taking the bus everywhere.

And if there was one flaw with the house, it was definitely the location. It was a long way from everything - the beach, the campus, the shopping district, everything required a long commute. About the only things that were close were a couple of schools, a handful of churches, and an assortment of fast food joints and steakhouses.

And the smells of the latter had been driving Tiffany just nuts.

Tiff had seen her weight just soar her first year at college, and given she was eating out five times a day, it wasn't too hard to figure out why. She'd always eaten so light at home. No offense intended to her own mother, but she wasn't a very good cook, and the diet of a duck was definitely not one for a snake. The first time she'd eaten one of MacGuffin's double-deep fried rat burgers, she knew what was missing on her plate, and she'd eaten like she was making up for lost time.

Bob and Flo Hookbill had been stunned when they saw their daughter that summer, a college drop out and 142 pounds heavier then when she left. In part to stop her Mom's nagging and in part because she knew she was pretty overweight, Tiffany had tried her hand at diet and exercise. She hadn't been very successful, to be honest, only managing to shed about six pounds in the last year and a half. Granted, she had given herself a lot of cheat days, and she really didn't work out much at all, but she'd been pretty good, okay?

Still, even though her Mom worried about her waistline once she went back to uni, she'd mostly stuck to the same diet she'd had at home. And the smells had been driving her mad with hunger. She'd earned herself one greasy meal. Right? Right.

As she opened the bag, she couldn't help but flick her forked tongue out, tasting the fast food grease in the very air, leaving her mouth watering. She felt a familiar pop as she unhinged her jaws, opening her mouth wide enough to engulf the burger whole.

Now, rumors to the contrary aside, she was perfectly capable of chewing her food, and given she would have liked to savor this, she'd have done so if she had enough time. However, Tiffany didn't know how long Chelsea would be out, so she had to make this quick. Chelsea was majoring in kinesiology, and the cocker spaniel girl was a bit of a health nut. Perhaps even more then her Mom, she'd been shocked by Tiffany's significant and rapid gain. She was always on her to eat better and work out, and while Tiff wasn't totally enamored with just how big she'd gotten, she was far from a willing participant in what sounded like sheer torture.

One by one, she slid each of her 6 double-patty burgers down her gullet, her throat stretching to allow the massive things easy access to her stomach. Swallowing the last one, she let out a content sigh and rubbed her belly, allowing herself only a moment of rest before springing to action. "Well, depending on your definition of 'spring'," Tiffany thought as the food baby she now carried worked to hinder her mobility somewhat. Her instincts screamed at her to find a sunny spot and rest, but she didn't dare waste a moment. Back home in Maine, she could just hide the evidence in the garbage can, as her parents had no sense of smell. Chelsea, on the other hand, had a VERY good sense of smell. Tiff wasn't sure if the woman had any bloodhound in her family tree or not, but she wouldn't have been surprised.

Spraying liberally with a can of febreze, Tiffany continued tasting the air until she was certain there was not a trace of fast food smell in the house. Popping a couple scotch mints into her mouth, she sucked and chewed on the candies as she slowly, languidly slithered through the back door. She knew it probably would have been safer to eat her meal at the fast food place (after all, what would she have done if Chelsea had been home?), but she was too self-conscious to eat such a large quantity in a public place.

As she opened the back door, she inhaled the warm, humid air with a happy sigh. The Florida climate may have been rather uncomfortable for the mammals, but it was perfect as far as the snake-woman was concerned. There was a reason so many of the reptilian immigrants to the US chose to move to The Sunshine State. Her nearly white scales shone in the late afternoon sun, and she beelined towards her favorite feature in the whole house.

At some point, one of the previous owners had installed a sauna in the backyard, and after she'd first used it, Tiffany had decided that it was the single best addition to any home imaginable, bar none. She languidly slithered past the rain barrels and Chelsea's small vegetable garden. She thought she might have crushed a cucumber plant, but she was rapidly sliding into full digestion mode, and simply wasn't as careful or concerned as she would was been otherwise.

Turning the heat on to start warming it up, she quickly got undressed, dutifully ignoring how jiggly her scaly flesh felt under her fingers, or how hard she had to work now to feel the firmness from her heavily stuffed belly. As the steam blasted from the first spoonful of water, she leaned back with a small grin playing on her face. "Life is good..."

info.brief_description: A weight gain interactive for many characters. Stuff them, watch them grow! (Females only)
info.description:
Here, we have many furries, all female, of various shapes and sizes. You're gonna get a chance to make them big and FAT!

Vore is allowed, but only soft vore. NO hard vore anything other than the mouth.

Belching and some slobiness is okay, but keep farting to a minimum, preferably only for comedy.

No death or weight-related illnesses!

Sex & bi/lesbian is allowed, but not too graphic.

Some characters might also grow in height as they fatten.

Keep weight gain semi-realistic. A character can fatten by no more than 50% of their body weight before that particular meal.
